description:
build: restore PATH before "dist banner"
        Fixes issue 3699.

messages.text:
PTAL.
On 2012/06/05 18:25:07, r wrote:
> http://codereview.appspot.com/6272048/diff/5001/src/all.bash#newcode11
> src/all.bash:11: OLDPATH=$PATH
> OLDPATH="$PATH"
> same below
> no idea what to do about this in the windows file
oh, i just didn't imagine there could be spaces in $PATH..

windows cmd shell is pretty dumb, "set a=a b c" won't break.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

http://codereview.appspot.com/6272048/diff/5001/src/all.bash
File src/all.bash (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6272048/diff/5001/src/all.bash#newcode11
src/all.bash:11: OLDPATH=$PATH
OLDPATH="$PATH"
same below
no idea what to do about this in the windows file
LGTM if a windows expert says LGTM too

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2787cca7ac8f ***

        Fixes issue 3699.
